### **Data Changes**

In this section you can change the names of the existing columns in the *dataset* in order to avoid the presence of spaces between names that could result in errors in the development of the model to be carried out. The user must choose the column that he wants to change and write in the respective text box the new name corresponding to the selected column, after defining the new name, just click on the **save** button and the change will be made. If you want to factorize a column in the next menu, **Factors**, you can perform this factorization, in the last section you can view the *dataset* with the new changes made.
